page.title: 06Traffic problems
page.content:
Bakewell attracts many visitors, mainly travelling by car. However a large amount of traffic not only comes to Bakewell but goes through. This is, though, very different on Mondays when it's {Market day,} and also, of course on Bank Holidays. We went into the centre of Bakewell and performed a 20 minute traffic survey. It showed that 94 vehicles came into Bakewell from Matlock Street and 114 went out along Buxton Road.
OUR TRAFFIC SURVEY
Vehicle type In Out Total Cars 52 81 133 Buses 3 0 3 Small vans 9 3 12 Large vans 9 12 21 Lorries 20 18 38 Motor Bikes 1 0 1
